document_data.title: Family hall
document_data.name: Silverhall
document_data.mainbody: '''Silverhall''' was the traditional home of the [[Silver (half-elf house)|Silver]] family of [[half-elf|half-elves]] in [[Veltalar|Velprintalar]] (now known as Old Velprintalar), [[Aglarond]].
document_data.Description: Silverhall was a low airy building and one of the oldest in the city. It featured towers and large lawned grounds that contained numerous guest houses and gazebos.
